name: ChainMan
description: About ChainManThis game is "VR · stealth horror action" of the first person view, hidden from the imminent zombies in the dark, surviving.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win.10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 Storage: 2 GB available space
